body.name: STREBITO Precision Screwdriver Set 153 in 1 Small Magnetic Screwdriver Set with Case, Electronic Repair Tool Kit for Computer, Laptop, iPhone, Macbook, PC, PS5, Xbox Controller, RC, Jewelers, Glasses
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Wider Application】The STREBITO Precision Screwdriver Set is professionally designed for electronic repair. With 140 precision bits - Phillips, Pentalobe, Torx Security, Star, SAE/Metric Hex, JIS, Flat Head, Triwing, Triangle, Square and more, this screwdriver kit is versatile to meet your different daily use, such as PC, Computer, Laptop, Cell Phone, Macbook, RC Car, Drone, Nintendo Switch, PS4 Controller Console, Watch, Eyeglass, Coffee Machine, Ring Doorbell, and other IT tech devices

【Impressed Quality】 All the mini screwdriver bits are made of reliable CRV steel for durability and strength, giving you a long tool life and perfect fit. The screw driver handle is made of PP & TPR material to prevent slipping, delivering comfortable control and maximum torque. Nylon pry tools will not mar delicate surfaces, making them excellent for small electronics. This computer tool kit comes in a durable carrying case for easy transportation, safe storage, and quick organization

【Practical Accessories】This computer screwdriver kit contains 13 effective tools for different repair needs. The Magnetic Pickup Bit helps you to grab micro objects from hard-to-reach places. Magnetic Mat is great for keeping track of screws and tiny parts. Magnetizer Demagnetizer Tool strengthens magnetism of the tips for easy screw grabbing, or weakens it to protect sensitive electronics. Additionally, 4 long neck bits allow you to reach screws that other precision screwdrivers can't

【Compact Case】A sturdy plastic organizing case is included, allowing you to store, protect and carry your electronics screwdriver set like a professional technician. Each bit is molded into a plastic storage slot with magnetic secured base, so you never have to worry about losing bits. Each slot is labeled with size for quick identification. The molded accessories slot keeps your repair tools stored safely. The clip latch close firmly, adding security to the precision screwdriver kit for you

【Lifetime Warranty】STREBITO manufactures premium quality, pro-grade screwdriver set and electronic toolkit that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Each pc screwdriver set is covered by STREBITO lifetime warranty and 30 days money-back guarantee. If you have any issues with your pc tool kit, simply contact customer service for troubleshooting help, parts, replacement or refund. Buy the STREBITO laptop screwdriver kit with confidence

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color of the box hides the size lettering of the bits
reviews.reviewText: Review of STREBITO Precision Screwdriver Set 153 in 1 Small Magnetic Screwdriver Set with Case...I received my Strebito screwdriver set today. It was well packaged with no noticeable damage. Opening the box I was astounded by how many bits there was. I probably won't be using all the bits but it's good to know I have them. I inspected each component and tried a few bits on a few screws that are used on hard disk drives. All the bits fit well and did not wiggle in the screw head.I really like the bit handle with the extension. The extension lengthens by pulling back on the knurled ring. When completely pulling the extension out of the handle, I inspected each length and it was well made without any defects (i.e. burrs and uneven groves). Prior to inserting back into the handle, pulling back the knurled ring is required. I tried to put it back in without doing that and the extension would not go in (which is a good sign that the bearing lock is working properly) Before placing it back in the box I lubed it with WD40. The only tool that didn't impress me was the tweezers. The tweezers are not made for grabbing anything except a screw or larger item. I held the tweezers up to a backlight and noticed a gap from the tip down 1/2 inch. When squeezed harder, the gap increased in size. A careful inspection and the culprit was the painted surface. There was a noticeable bump that had to be scraped off. Overall, this tool set is very well made and I will probably use it for many years. if I could read the sizes it would have been near perfect. I ordered the blue box and the lettering is VERY small and grey in color. I have 20/20 vision but I cannot read the sizes. Even angling the box to the light makes it worse. I guess, small bits deserve small lettering. A background of white with black lettering would have been a nice touch.Other than that, it's a great tool kit. Can't beat the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am impressed
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect much when ordering as amazon is turning into a sea of Chinese garbage for sale. I have to say that when I got my order I was pleasantly surprised.First thing I noticed was the weight of the set. Certainly not plastic junk if it is this heavy I thought.2nd, the case the set comes in- nice looking, carbon fiber top, nice tight latch on it. Looked good and felt well built.3rd, opening the set confirmed it is well built. Everything nice and tight inside with nothing falling out.Came with a magnetic pad that I wasn't expecting.Great kit for the money. I would recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a very nice set, the only problem is if you're taking apart a wii, the screwdriver is too fat to fit in the 2 deep holes on the outside of the wii case. Other than that, it's a very nice set. Will work for so many other things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When comparing this directly to other products here on Amazon, this really is a good set. It's also a good value for the price and I'm keeping this product - to be clear I will use this product and not return it. There is just one problem with the product which prevents me from giving it a full 5 stars. When you open the case the hing feels very weak and fragile. So basically, while the case is open and in use you better not drop it or bend it because it is very susceptible to damage. They should have invested a little more money and made the hinge longer and stronger. I would've happily paid more money to have a higher quality case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars STREBITO Precision Screwdriver Set 153 in 1 Small Magnetic
reviews.reviewText: Arrived as expected, great set, some pieces have a little bit of grease, but it is fine. Great product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Set Has Everything!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my son who dabbles with just about everything. It was a hit with the whole family and has been very handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and convenient for PC work!
reviews.reviewText: My son ordered this to fix his gaming laptop and it had everything he needed to complete the job! Saved him big money, going the DIY route. Satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Little Toolkit
reviews.reviewText: This toolkit has everything you need if you work on electronics, phones, computers, etc. It also has some nice features like a magnetized area where you can place tiny screws. There are so many bits of every kind. The quality is really nice and the bits hold their own even when placing a lot of torque. Highly recommended if you are a tinkerer.
